info.name: MX Record Detection
author: pdteam
info.description: An MX record was detected. MX records direct emails to a mail exchange server.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 42662
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;zlv.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 MX
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 42662
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 1, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 512

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;zlv.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 MX

;; ANSWER SECTION:
zlv.beta.gouv.fr.	300	IN	MX	1 SMTP.GOOGLE.COM.

info.name: SPF Record - Detection
author: rxerium
info.description: An SPF TXT record was detected

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 37508
;; flags: rd ad; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;zlv.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 TXT
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 37508
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 3, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 512

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;zlv.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 TXT

;; ANSWER SECTION:
zlv.beta.gouv.fr.	300	IN	TXT	"google-site-verification=fF6Z7Kjb5zd2CZBP6OVOCMpON7Y-aKWLpmTc_stWZeU"
zlv.beta.gouv.fr.	300	IN	TXT	"v=spf1 include:_spf.alwaysdata.com include:_spf.google.com ~all"
zlv.beta.gouv.fr.	300	IN	TXT	"google-site-verification=VoBT_TGR22ABAZuPu2rRNwtftqdiVZM9uk-S8mc_Ffw"

info.name: DNS TXT Record Detected
author: pdteam
info.description: A DNS TXT record was detected. The TXT record lets a domain admin leave notes on a DNS server.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 37508
;; flags: rd ad; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;zlv.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 TXT
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 37508
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 3, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 512

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;zlv.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 TXT

;; ANSWER SECTION:
zlv.beta.gouv.fr.	300	IN	TXT	"google-site-verification=fF6Z7Kjb5zd2CZBP6OVOCMpON7Y-aKWLpmTc_stWZeU"
zlv.beta.gouv.fr.	300	IN	TXT	"v=spf1 include:_spf.alwaysdata.com include:_spf.google.com ~all"
zlv.beta.gouv.fr.	300	IN	TXT	"google-site-verification=VoBT_TGR22ABAZuPu2rRNwtftqdiVZM9uk-S8mc_Ffw"

info.name: CAA Record
author: pdteam
info.description: A CAA record was discovered. A CAA record is used to specify which certificate authorities (CAs) are allowed to issue certificates for a domain.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 13199
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;zlv.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 CAA
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 13199
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 1, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 512

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;zlv.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 CAA

;; AUTHORITY SECTION:
zlv.beta.gouv.fr.	300	IN	SOA	dns1.alwaysdata.com. hostmaster.alwaysdata.com. 1742475237 3600 900 1209600 300

info.name: NS Record Detection
author: pdteam
info.description: An NS record was detected. An NS record delegates a subdomain to a set of name servers.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 8107
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;zlv.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 NS
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 8107
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 2, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 1232

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;zlv.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 NS

;; ANSWER SECTION:
zlv.beta.gouv.fr.	300	IN	NS	dns2.alwaysdata.com.
zlv.beta.gouv.fr.	300	IN	NS	dns1.alwaysdata.com.

info.name: DNS DMARC - Detect
author: juliosmelo
info.description: DNS DMARC information was detected.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 54866
;; flags: rd ad; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;_dmarc.zlv.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 TXT
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 54866
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 1, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 1232

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;_dmarc.zlv.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 TXT

;; ANSWER SECTION:
_dmarc.zlv.beta.gouv.fr.	300	IN	TXT	"v=DMARC1; p=none"

info.name: WAF Detection
author: dwisiswant0
lu4nx
info.description: A web application firewall was detected.

request:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: zlv.beta.gouv.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Content-Length: 27
Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded
Accept-Encoding: gzip

_=<script>alert(1)</script>
response: HTTP/1.1 200 OK Connection: close Accept-Ranges: bytes Content-Type: text/html Date: Sun, 15 Jun 2025 08:16:46 GMT Etag: "603-636d3c26ea1ac-gzip" Last-Modified: Thu, 05 Jun 2025 14:16:28 GMT Server: Apache Sozu-Id: 01JXSAK6437XTFCZS9EG7HN96X Vary: Accept-Encoding Zéro Logement Vacant
curl-command: curl -X 'POST' -d '_=<script>alert(1)</script>' -H 'Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded' -H 'Host: zlv.beta.gouv.fr' -H 'User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)' 'https://zlv.beta.gouv.fr/'

info.name: Detect SSL Certificate Issuer
author: lingtren
info.description: Extract the issuer's organization from the target's certificate. Issuers are entities which sign and distribute certificates.

info.name: SSL DNS Names
author: pdteam
info.description: Extract the Subject Alternative Name (SAN) from the target's certificate. SAN facilitates the usage of additional hostnames with the same certificate.

info.name: TLS Version - Detect
author: pdteam
pussycat0x
info.description:
TLS version detection is a security process used to determine the version of the Transport Layer Security (TLS) protocol used by a computer or server.
It is important to detect the TLS version in order to ensure secure communication between two computers or servers.

info.name: TLS Version - Detect
author: pdteam
pussycat0x
info.description:
TLS version detection is a security process used to determine the version of the Transport Layer Security (TLS) protocol used by a computer or server.
It is important to detect the TLS version in order to ensure secure communication between two computers or servers.
